name: icon-visibiliy
objective: Icon is visible in gnome status area of top menu bar
description: Icon of Bluetooth applet should be visible in gnome status are of top menu bar.

steps.description: From the desktop, check that Bluetooth applet icon is visible in top menu bar

author: zingile

name: menu-visibility
objective: Menu of the Bluetooth applet extension is visible
description: Menu of the Bluetooth applet should be accessible when user click on the Bluetooth applet icon in gnome status area of top menu bar.

steps.description: From the desktop, click on Bluetooth applet icon

author: zingile

name: settings
objective: Bluetooth Settings option is visible and accessible in Bluetooth applet menu
description: User should see the 'Bluetooth Settings' option in Bluetooth applet menu. Clicking on this option should open the Bluetooth panel UI.

steps.description: From the desktop, click on Bluetooth applet icon

author: zingile
